title: For Sale: Kleinow (Boston) Polar Bear PSA 6

posts.post_title: For Sale: Kleinow (Boston) Polar Bear PSA 6
posts.post_content: Very tough front/back combo. This exact card sold at REA for $1440 (after juice) in 2015. Offered here at $1075 delivered....Price reduced to $950, thnx..**SOLD**
